mapper.update: UPDATE T_SYS_USER TSU SET TSU.`logicDel`='N' WHERE TSU.`userId`=#{userId}

UPDATE T_SYS_USER TSU
TSU.`username`=#{username},
TSU.`password`=#{password},
TSU.`nickname`=#{nickname},
TSU.`realname`=#{realname},
TSU.`phone`=#{phone},
TSU.`tel`=#{tel},
TSU.`email`=#{email},
TSU.`sex`=#{sex},
TSU.`updateTime`=#{updateTime}
TSU.`userTag`=#{userTag},
TSU.`status`=#{status},
TSU.`remark`=#{remark},
WHERE TSU.`userId`=#{userId}
